thread.title: Anthony Ha, New General Manager of Hyatt Regency Suzhou and Area Vice President, Begins New Era at Hotel

author: cbs8
title: Anthony Ha, New General Manager of Hyatt Regency Suzhou and Area Vice President, Begins New Era at Hotel
text:
Hyatt Regency Suzhou
SUZHOU, China , Aug. 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Anthony Ha has been appointed general manager of Hyatt Regency Suzhou and area vice president, effective August 1, 2015 .
Photo - http://photos.prnasia.com/prnh/20150811/0861507357-a
Photo - http://photos.prnasia.com/prnh/20150811/0861507357-b
A graduate of Washington State University , Mr. Ha began his career with Hyatt in 1986 at Hyatt Regency San Francisco , followed by an assignment at Hyatt Regency Macau . After that, Mr. Ha worked with various hotels in mainland China , Hong Kong and Micronesia before rejoining the Hyatt family in February 2011 . He became the opening general manager for Hyatt Regency Qingdao in August 2011 and subsequently assumed the position of area vice president in April 2015 .
"It has been a great pleasure to work with such a talented team at Hyatt Regency Qingdao over the past four years, and I am looking forward to leading a new team at Hyatt Regency Suzhou and the other hotels in my area of responsibility," Mr. Ha said.
In his free time, Mr. Ha enjoys cycling and playing golf. He speaks English, Mandarin, Cantonese and Vietnamese.
About Hyatt Regency Suzhou
Hyatt Regency Suzhou offers 355 spacious guestrooms and suites and a Regency Club executive floor. The hotel features five restaurants and lounges, more than 1,394 sq m (15,000 sq ft) of innovative meeting, event and wedding venues, plus spa and wellness facilities. Neighboring picturesque Jinji Lake , the Culture and Arts Center, the Suzhou International Expo Center and the Ferris Wheel Park, Hyatt Regency Suzhou provides a convenient blend between Suzhou's ancient city and its new district. The hotel is a key connecting point between Suzhou and Shanghai , offering easy accessibility to its guests. It takes just 25 minutes by train to reach Shanghai , one hour by car to reach Shanghai Hongqiao International Airport, and 10 minutes by car to reach Suzhou SIP Railway Station, the transportation hub of the Yangtze River Delta.
About Hyatt Regency
Hyatt Regency is an energizing hotel brand that connects travelers to who and what matters most to them. More than 140 conveniently located Hyatt Regency urban and resort locations in more 30 countries around the world serve as go-to gathering spaces for every occasion -- from efficient business meetings to memorable family vacations. The brand offers a one-stop experience that puts everything guests need at their fingertips. Hyatt Regency hotels and resorts offer a full range of services and amenities, including notable culinary experiences; technology-enabled ways to collaborate; the space to work, engage or relax; and expert planners who take care of every detail. For more information, visit hyattregency.com or facebook.com/HyattRegency.
